title: Sword Combat Powerful Whooshes SFX
description: The sword combat powerful whooshes and swooshes sound effects pack features 50 high quality swords, axes, blunt weapons or any medieval RPG weapon swinging sounds + violent fighting impacts. Add dynamism to the swords fights in your game!
longDescription:
You can hear a demo with a background music behind: Youtube demo video

The packs contain awesome woosh and swooshes sounds designed to perfectly fit together in a combo. They can fit many weapons from swords, to axes, blunts, wooden clubs, mage staff etc..


In addition, you will also get powerful impact sounds to make the combats in your game truly memorable!


Don't hesitate to check my other sound effects here: IndieGameModels Store

Do you want to optimize the performance of your game? Check this awesome plugin! Dynamic Lighting Portal System (+30 to 60% FPS increase)
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Non cutting weapon (like club or mage staff) woosh x7
  • Normal sword woosh x7
  • normal sword woosh with metallic feeling x7
  • Heavy sword or other weapon woosh x7
  • Dagger woosh x7
  • Violent impacts x13
  • Sword hits other sword x2


Number of Audio Waves: 50

Number of Audio Cues: 50

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1khz 16bit MONO Wav

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 0:46

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All
